author: AdamGrossTX
body:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/d43b2cf958805ab12906c682f5d75ba01641cb47/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management/commands/management/Computer.cs#L1989

According to this https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/909264/naming-conventions-in-active-directory-for-computers-domains-sites-and, AD doesn't seem to restrict digits only.  However, you can see I tried Rename-Computer and PS doesn't like it. But can change it to digits only in the Windows UI without issue.  

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20917262/35575630-7de7e8d4-05a2-11e8-9ed3-f71a5b16bc28.png)

comments.author: markekraus
AdamGrossTX
comments.body: Wow. I even linked to the same article. I tried to due diligence. Sorry I missed that.

title: Why is there an restriction  to disallow on All Digits for the new computername?
